_tankEmptyCM_: Distance from sensor when tank is empty
_tankFullCM_: Distance from sensor when tank is full
_motorOnThresholdPercent_: Motor turns ON when water level % is below this
_motorOffThresholdPercent_: Motor turns OFF when water level % reaches this
_dryRunIncreasePercent_: Minimum % increase in water level required after motor ON to avoid dry-run shutdown
